title: Crew Show!
description: Recording on Back to the Future Day Matt arrives somewhat annoyed at the prevelance of commentary on his DeLorean. Matt's annoyance is tempered with a recent to the FIRM rally school in Florida where the guys all got turns to abuse some of their finest rally vehicles, a Miata and strangely enough a Tahoe. In addition to rallying Matt brings tales of runway racing from Shift Sector, we discuss hydraulic handbrakes, the new McLaren 570s and the new NSX.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
